scripts.build-client: rm -rf ./client && rm -rf ./public-client && SP=$(pwd) && CP=$(find $(dirname $SP) -type d -name frontend) && cd $CP && npm run clean:build && cp -rT ./dist $SP/client && cd $SP && mkdir ./public-client && find ./client -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -not -name index.html -print0 | xargs -0 mv -t ./public-client
scripts.local:build-client: rm -rf ./client && rm -rf ./public-client && SP=$(pwd) && CP=$(find .. -type d -name frontend) && cd $CP && npm run clean:build && cp -rT ./dist $SP/client && cd $SP && mkdir ./public-client && find ./client -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -not -name index.html -print0 | xargs -0 mv -t ./public-client
